author: Deepak Sharma
comment: Most pathetic paid services. They will not forward your application till you pay them. Once you pay them they will not bother to talk to you. Very bad experience. Try Times job as Naukri has registered fake recruiters, who will call you and ask for money. Please someone let me know that how can I sue Naukri, I will be grateful to that person.

reply.author: infoedge.com
reply.content:
"Dear Deepak,

Please share your contact details with us at servicehead@naukri.com, and our service team will contact you to resolve the concern. 

Kindly keep the Subject Line as “Naukri App Feedback”.

Regards,
Naukri Fast Forward"

author: Nimesh Sapkal
comment: Good App but Worst Service. Naukri India Deserves more than 5 star but Naukri not even deserves a Single. all the openings Look Like fake as there's no Response from the recruiters. If recruiters really needs employee atleast they see your profile.Naukri Should Stop their Gulf Services. Waste of Money and Time.

reply.author: infoedge.com
reply.content:
"Thank you for taking out time to rate us. We have introduced a new 'My Apply Status' feature which is available on the homepage of your app. This feature not just shows the status of your application, it also helps you gauge where it stands among other applications.

All the very best for your job search and we look forward to serving you again."

author: Muhammed Aijaz
comment: Everywhere I read never, pay any amount to any job portal or company to get hire, I never ever have been selected or contacted by any  hr, any company, or any employer, numbers of application I have submitted here but no response, always shows that 50%, 40% or 30%, matching, nothing else more than it. May be i'm not paying any amount to them, this is  the only reason,  its simply ennui, wastage of time full of garbage, now boycotting from this app.

reply.author: infoedge.com
reply.content:
Hi Aijaz,

Thank you for sharing you concern. We deeply regret the inconvenience caused. We rarely get such complaints from our users. Let's connect at jsfeedback@naukrigulf.com to exactly understand your concern and for a quick fix. We will try our best to help you.

Regards,
Tam Naukrigulf

author: Play2Win Walker
comment: I dnt like it all. Even if u put your Work Experience as Fresher. U will get the Shorlist Job of Atleast 2-10 year Experience. And if u wnt to Keep your Profile on the Top thn u hve to pay for it i.e $82. If this Is the Thing Thn whts the Difference between NaukriGulf And Monster/Shine... They 2 do the same  Charge for Something. HATE This App. I think so they dont even Deserve 1Star

reply.content:
Please share your contact details with us at servicehead@naukri.com, and our service team will contact you to resolve the concern.

comment: I applied for a job on this site and recieved response from a school but it was a scam. The people offered me a job by just looking at my documents, no interviews was taken and when I googled the e-mail id's through which they asked me to communicate with them , i found it fake. Please take some serious steps about these scammers. They are using original companies names to lure people.

reply.author: infoedge.com
reply.content: Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We do not represent any employer, recruiter or recruitment consultant sending such fraudulent communication. If you've received such suspicious email communication, please report it to us at abuse@naukrigulf.com.
